name: George Herrada Farfán
bio: Hi 👋, I’m a web developer from Perú,  I really enjoy making websites and I like to follow best practices (clean code, user experience).

top_projects.name: Encriptador_de_texto
top_projects.description: Encriptador de texto desarrollado con JavaScript, HTML y CSS para el primer challenge del Proyecto ONE de Oracle+Alura LATAM

top_projects.name: GNS3-Guide
top_projects.description: This is a guide to the different operating systems in the GNS3 software installation aid and their respective configurations, as well as the correct import of your images to simulate. It also includes various automated paradigm solving and ethical hacking.

top_projects.name: PokeDex
top_projects.description: A web application that allows you to search for pokemon and view their corresponding information through a request to the pokemon API.

top_projects.name: YourOwnChatGPT
top_projects.description: In this project you will learn how to create your own chatbot using OpenAI's ChatGPT and Python 3. With this chatbot you will be able to interact with users in a natural way and help them in different situations.🤖

top_projects.name: Spanish-Sign-Translator
top_projects.description: This project uses Python and the OpenCV and MediaPipe libraries to detect and translate signs in real time.

top_projects.name: AutomatedMicrosoftEdgeInstallation
top_projects.description: Our automated script to install Microsoft Edge on Linux on Fedora is the perfect solution for those looking for a more advanced and efficient browsing experience. Try our automated script today and enjoy the power and speed of Microsoft Edge on your Linux system in minutes!✨

top_projects.name: Happy-Holidays
top_projects.description: User-interactive rotating Christmas tree and lights, in 3D and a gift at the base. Developed with HTML5, CSS, JAVASCRIPT. Happy Holidays!

top_projects.name: SexToysWeb
top_projects.description: Prototipo de un Sex Shop online para delivery, en HTML5, CSS3, JAVASCRIPT.

readme_content:
「

Hello There
I'm gherrada22, a Student, I like Penguins and Apples, but I don't like Windows.

~ George Herrada Farfán ~

」


More Info


## Hi I'm George Herrada Farfán
Logical and results-oriented full stack developer with a strong love for the front end. Dedicated to building users. Judicious and creative in crafting effective solutions to drive competitive advantage and revenue growth as per client requirements. Analytical in problem solving with a calm and focused demeanor and open to receiving feedback.
💻 I am currently studying for a degree in Systems Engineering.
🤔 I’m looking for help with outstanding project ideas.
🐰 I’m looking to collaborate with any Open - Source web projects.
📫 How to reach me: georgeherradafarfan@pm.me.
⚡ Fun fact: I always try to learn something new and then sleep till it stores in the brain. ## 🌐 Socials:
